short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take control of your privacy by blurring sensitive information like names, group names, messages, and images on WhatsApp Web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BlurSafe for WhatsApp is a powerful privacy extension designed to enhance your WhatsApp Web experience by giving you control over what information is visible on your screen. Whether you’re in a public space or simply prefer more privacy, BlurSafe allows you to blur sensitive details such as contact names, group names, messages, images, and chat messages.

With just a few clicks, you can customize which elements of your WhatsApp Web interface are blurred, ensuring that personal information remains confidential. This extension is perfect for users who value discretion while working or browsing in shared environments, or who want to safeguard their privacy at any moment.

Features:

- Blur individual contact names
- Blur group names
- Blur messages and chat images
- Unblur Last Message
- Maintain control over which elements are visible
- Simple and user-friendly interface
- Quick setup with customizable options

*If the extension doesn't take effect immediately, simply refresh your WhatsApp Web page to activate the changes.*

Take charge of your privacy and use WhatsApp Web with confidence. With BlurSafe, you’re always in control of what’s displayed on your screen.
